website_summaries.verdict: Convenient and budget-friendly, this car cushion comes with a built-in heater and large profile to fit most car interiors.
pros: Large pad is covered in a soft velour/polyester blend for extra comfort and warmth
Temperature can reach as high as 114°F with 3 distinct settings built into the controls
cons: The fabric slides around on some smooth seat surfaces, such as leather

customer_reviews.title: Egg on my face
customer_reviews.text: It heats very well. However, it came without the inline controller so it is either very hot or you unplug it for off. I'm very disappointed that the description and pictures are false. This was a gift and the price isn't worth messing with a return. Today, the person I gave this to as a Christmas gift proudly announced the controller was tucked inside. I should have checked before writing this review, but .... no buts, no excuses, I screwed up. This is a nice seat heater and it provides more than enough heat (thus the need for a low setting). I changed to 5 stars. My apologies to the seller. I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Don S

customer_reviews.title: Give Adequate Heat
customer_reviews.text: The cushion gives me adequate heat but takes awhile to heat up, about 5 minuets or so. It has a switch for off-low-high settings, If you want to use it in a house or building you need an AC power adaptor that is shown in the 'others bought this' window in the lower left hand corner. The power module has an LED indicator and another on the connector receptacle. It does not come with the cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Scott  Brooks

customer_reviews.title: When you are paying a 2-figure price for what would be a 3-figure priced option, don't hope for a lot!
customer_reviews.text: It looks decent enough and is comfortable to sit on. The heating strength is nowhere near the capability of that you find for the vehicle manufacturers' options. It usually provides enough heat but the warmup time in Minnesota's sub zero weather isn't that impressive. Not sure what the point is of the 2-position hi/lo heating selector switch, since ultimately, the in-seat thermostat takes control to limit the heat you feel. The elastic straps to hold the back to the seat were woefully too short to ever fit over the seatback in my Toyota Tundra. In short, more wattage in the heating elements and adjustable straps for the back.
customer_reviews.author: Leo F. Davids

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Elastic - not so hot.
customer_reviews.text: The heat works fabulously in the very frigid northeast! My only complaint is that the elastic on the top portion of the seat was not entirely sewn into them hem and ripped as we put it over the seat back of my daughter’s Subaru Outback. It was also a bit too short and we really had to stretch it hard to get it to fit. A Velcro strap might be better to allow it to be more adjustable. As you can see from the photos, the elastic digs into the seat pretty deeply.
customer_reviews.author: E. Woodside

customer_reviews.title: I Love A Toasty Drive to Work on Cold Mornings!
customer_reviews.text: I don't live in snow country, but it works well for me with overnight temps in the 30s and 40s. It makes for a toasty drive to work on cold mornings. I do have to remember to unplug it when my drive is done. My car's 12 volt outlet remains "hot" when the ignition switch is off. I highly recommend a "battery protector" to prevent dead batteries when I forget to unplug (it happens a lot).  The battery protector has made the Heated Seat Cushion a viable option for me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: no need to buy a car with heated seats now!
customer_reviews.text: So far works great, switch is a little cheaply made it looks like. but it works, nice to have a warm tush and back to start the drive, I only use it to get started out then shut it off after about 5mins., and it stay's warm for most of my trips. I would buy again. Used in my truck and works good. ---Note--- there was no adapter to 120 voltage for household use, just 12 volt auto lighter plug in.
customer_reviews.author: Pennywise

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a really old one that finally gave out (not sure if it was the same brand). This gets nice and warm pretty quickly. The only thing I'd like to change is maybe make the low setting a little lower. High is very warm, low doesn't seem to be much lower. This would need to be removed when the weather warms up as the fleecy material and foam is very insulating in itself. I like it and it's a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: $5/month for a warm rump?  Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I read in the reviews that these tend to stop working after a few months. True. Mine lasted four months. At 20 bucks, that comes to $5 a month, or one winter season. Would you not pay $5 a month to avoid literally freezing your butt off? I think that's an awesome deal! And I'm ordering my next one now. These are also good in warmer weather to provide heat to a sore back. Even turned off, it adds lumbar support.
customer_reviews.author: Momonga

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my car
customer_reviews.text: I have had other seat warmers but most are the width of the seat of my Camry and make it hard to fasten seat belt. This is the first one to be shaped perfectly for my car, has good anchoring straps, and actually matches my car seat better. I like the velour finish and the control... 1 week after purchase I am just delighted by this modestly priced seat heater.
customer_reviews.author: grandma9

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit the Toyota Prius.
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit a Toyota Prius 2006-2009. It barely covers the seats, after installing, it's not safe to drive in, since this seat keeps moving and sliding around, the strap broke. There is no indication that it is on, there is a high/off/low switch but it there is no light to tell you it's in that mode. Not sure if it's the material or the heating element that is actually warming up my behind. I ran out after a while and found out that car seat is hotter. The upper material of this thing is acting as an insulator, so this will probably work better upside down. Returning because it doesn't work on the car.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M

customer_reviews.title: HEAVEN ON MY BUM!
customer_reviews.text: Not heaven on a bun but heaven on my bum ! (use this for your advertising) I somewhat poo-pooed seat warmers and being I don't have a new enough car for real seat warmers....this is the quickest and best solution. Every time I plug it in and it starts to warm up, I find myself saying "AHHHH". I only need the low setting (there is high and low) and I am warm blooded anyway, so I find I don't need my heat on all the time anymore. Great value and it matches my interior - so I am very happy with this purchase !
customer_reviews.author: skip

customer_reviews.title: Good seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this seat warmer to help with lower back pains on long drives. It heats up quickly, and quite honestly is almost too hot. I usually keep it on warm. It is barely noticeable on the seat and works great. My only complaint is that I wish it had controls to heat the back and bottom separately. My butt was on fire! I only wanted it on my lower back. So, I put some blankets down and this helped. However, I will say that I didn't really see any choices out there that had this option, so maybe this is something they can do in the future? Otherwise, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of 3 children

customer_reviews.title: Use in car
customer_reviews.text: We have older (but leather) cars and we're living in cold winters. This made it much more bareable as the engine warmed and heated the car. Only 4 stars cause the hooks to hold in place broke after a few months and now it shifts everywhere, but otherwise still working after 6 years!
customer_reviews.author: Nanvey

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this heated seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought a stripped down model of car when my son was younger so I bought this to heat my seat, this is actually a second one as he puked in my first and rather than try to clean it well enough with all the electronics for this price I thought it best to just pitch the old one and buy a new one. It definitely helps with all my aches and pains which are many. I have had 2 back surgeries and have endometriosis and am currently dealing with a pinched nerve so sitting in a car for very long is pretty miserable but the heated seat helps so much.
customer_reviews.author: christineu

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t exactly what I was looking for, but it worked for me
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to keep me warm at work during winter. I sit by a very cold window and couldn’t stand the loud fan sound of a space heater. So I bought an adapter plug and used it often. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kt J

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the latest "version".
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Wagan heated seat cushions for years now. They last about two years, but as I'm in Michigan, they are used a lot. My problem this year are the "hooks" that came with it to attach it to the seat. I should not have to haul out pliers and a screwdriver to pry open the end of the hook that's supposed to attach to the elastic, and I'm not at all sure how well the other end is going to work as it's a V-shape rather than the S-shape that they used in the past. I doubt I will buy from Wagan in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Nice improvement for my work day in my drafty truck.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my work truck which has terrible heating and lots of cold air draft. Very easy to fit onto my drivers seat with attached elastic straps, and plugged right into my Cigarette lighter plug. The cushioning was about 50% less than I would have liked, but within a few minutes my seat was nice and warm....and I was noticeably warmer than I was without it. As far as I can tell, there is no strain on my trucks battery and the instructions tell you to unplug if the vehicle is not running. Pretty happy with this improvement to my work day.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Warm & Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Valentines Day present for my husband because he just bought a new car but couldn't afford the upgrade package with the heated seats. My husband loves this seat. It kept him very toasty for the reminder of the season, and it was incredibly easy to install, even for a man who claims he has no handyman skills. He has to remember to unplug it when he gets out of the car so it doesn't drain his battery, but he has a good memory for that type of stuff, so he doesn't mind. Very happy with this purchase as it made my man very happy.
customer_reviews.author: DutchrubTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Toasty Buns!
customer_reviews.text: 1. I use this everyday (I bought it in winter, and it’s still winter) 2. Plug it in while in use, and unplug when you get out of the car. Yes, it has ON / OFF. Yes, it’s best to unplug it. 3. This thing will seriously heat up your rear end fast 4. I only attach it to the seat at the headrest so that I can move it from driver to passenger seat. I love it. As always, I’ll update if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Neidert

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really warm up fast or that hot.
customer_reviews.text: It tends to slide a lot on leather seats as others have posted, but i had that aspect covered. Does not really get very hot even at high setting and takes time. It is however comfortable, soft and makes getting into a cold vehicle slightly warmer even before it does warm up. I guess if you let your car warm up and turned it on for 5 minutes prior to taking off it would be ok but then again whats the point of needing a seat warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: You get what pay for
customer_reviews.text: I can only feel the heat on my butt not my back and doesn't stay in the position I placed it in even with the straps and those little clips that are supposed to keep the cushion in place don't fit my car seat; my seat doesn't have anywhere for the clips
customer_reviews.author: Amiyna Ford

customer_reviews.title: No time = dead battery
customer_reviews.text: Works well, comfortable, warm but not too hot. The reason i can't rate it higher is because there's no timer. This might not seem critical until you forget to unplug it and end up with a dead battery. That's happened twice in the last few weeks. My fault for not unplugging it yes, but that means it doesn't suit MY needs, if you can remember to unplug it or your power outlet turns off with the ignition it's a great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: Did not work right out of the box. Barely made enough heat that you could just feel it on the back of your hand if you stuck it under the cushion. But you couldn't feel anything at all on the top side. Tried it on low and high settings. Didn't make a difference. Sent it back immediately for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Installs easy and for as cheap as it is
customer_reviews.text: Installs easy and for as cheap as it is, it gets the job done. HOWEVER, if you leave it plugged into the cigarette outlet, IT WILL DRAIN YOUR BATTERY, even not switched on. My wife has now done this twice, and twice the battery was drained. 2015 Ford Escape, so its not an old car by any means. This should not be drawing a charge when the ignition is off.....I'll give part of the blame to Ford as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hoova0797

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I use this a lot, especially in the mornings. It heats up in about a minute or so. Perfect for my bottom side and lower back. My only wish would be if it were a little longer/higher in the back so it could reach my upper back. Then this would be a perfect world. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Carol M. Larson

customer_reviews.title: So far good buy
customer_reviews.text: I hate winter. I work second shift and when I get to my car it takes a while for my car to heat up. So I plug in this great gadget and it warms up very fast. I only used it for 2 weeks on a 20 min. A day Use. While searching for different brands a common problem was it would work great for a short while and then a product dies. Never to work again. I will update how long this product will last.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: OK heated seat cushion
customer_reviews.text: We bought this unit a couple of years ago and finally got it installed. The cord is on the right side so that it is OK for the driver's side, but gets in the way when installed on the passenger seat. It does not get too warm, but does improve comfort in cold climates. We just leave it plugged in and turned on all winter. All in all,an OK product.
customer_reviews.author: nopalen

customer_reviews.title: I will be looking elsewhere for a better one.
customer_reviews.text: Front and side elastic straps are way too small and the ones that hold the bottom back broke the first time I sat in the seat . I only weight 175 lbs. I would think they could make the straps heavier duty. The strap popped off at the seam where it was sewn in . I was hoping to get anotherone if this work out . I will be looking elsewhere for a better one .
customer_reviews.author: harry horstman

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for a Buffalo winter
customer_reviews.text: This product works just as described. I've had it a little over 1.5 months now and it's been great. I was turning it off every time I got out of the car since so many reviews said it would drain the battery, but when I accidentally leave it switched on overnight it doesn't seem to cause a problem. This might be because I have a hybrid car and they tend to be very energy efficient...either way, great seat warmer, especially for women if you get lower back aches during your cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Claire

customer_reviews.title: It was a very nice drive this winter
customer_reviews.text: The Wagan velour heated seat cushion made my drive very comfortable this winter. It lasted the winter and can be used next season unlike others I bought in the past that lasted i season. The heat was even and just right.
customer_reviews.author: Raybee

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works like a regular heating pad getting hot then cooling off. Wil drain your car battery if left plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Dkje4

customer_reviews.title: Takes a little too long to heat up
customer_reviews.text: I have a relatively short drive home from work late at night in cold country. I bought this to keep me warm waiting for the heater to kick in. Unfortunately it takes as long as the heater to warm up. Once it does it’s toasty but takes too long for my need.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfecto
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Keeps my butt and back warm when driving or sitting in the car. If you have back problems then a heat pad won't give that much long term help. Backpad came extremely fast at a ridiculous price tag. Even if this made in China item last one month, it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Clees Hyun

customer_reviews.title: Heat up those buns!
customer_reviews.text: This seat cover keeps my buns super toasty! It doesn't really provide that much cushion, as that's not what it's intended for. The heating mechanism is fantastic! It has a low and high setting, the low setting is fine, the high setting is reffered at least for me. It heats up my lower back, butt, and part of my thighs. Since I don't have a heater in my car, this keeps me warm enough during the winter and rainy season. A good buy for sure!
customer_reviews.author: amy brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat Heater
customer_reviews.text: Great seat heater. My daughter inherited my old car, and while grateful, she is intensely jealous of my new-to-me car's seat heaters, especially since I make her park on the street. Age before beauty, dear. Gave this to her for Christmas, and she has used it a ton. Soft, warm enough not to overtoast, and heats QUICKLY, which is the bonus. Good buy, and for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime B.

customer_reviews.title: Warm driver seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cold leather seats in my car. I love it! I no longer have to freeze my backside off trying to get home in the middle of the night. This product is of good quality and well worth the price. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Reagan M Moore

customer_reviews.title: Teenager loves this thing
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a teenager that is always cold. She likes it and it keeps her warm in the car. Just went through a very cold February and this helped her out a lot during her commutes to school. Just had one slight issue with it still drawing power and draining her battery even when the switch was in the off position. As long as she remembers to unplug it when she gets out of the car, all is good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindlemenow

customer_reviews.title: Excellent easy to use product, great value
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, comfortable, and although we didn't expect to use it until Fall, we had an April snow - heated seat & back make these FAR superior to *normal* seat covers! Ours had no quality issue or concern at all. High heat was plenty warm & soon, had to select low within 10 minutes. Ahhh . . .
customer_reviews.author: John D Blue

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: I would say the low function is mostly pointless. but the high is a good warm temperature. great for the cold NY winters. Doesn't hold a candle to the cars heated seats but those are broken soo this was a worth wile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shanold

customer_reviews.title: Heats good but doesnt stay in its place
customer_reviews.text: One strap was ripped upon arrival. Stitched it on. Later came off again. But even with the straps it moves & deforms & lots of times I'd have to pull over shortly after taking off & adjust & flatten it so that its behind me. Even the bottom. Heat is very good. Long enough cord.
customer_reviews.author: Boogyman6788

customer_reviews.title: this product did not come with charger
customer_reviews.text: As this product did not come with charger, I have to spend another 20 dollars to make this product useful which was no mentioned in the product review and i would like to return it if it is possible as it is still in the original cover
customer_reviews.author: chechi chechi

customer_reviews.title: I will probably buy my third one soon!
customer_reviews.text: Best product ever. I was in a hit and run back in 2012 and my spine was fractured. This little number is in my car at all times and I have one at my desk at home. My spinal pain will always be there for life but this makes it go away by at least 70%. I have lower, middle and upper spine pain. This heated seat cushion helps the entire back. MY SAVING GRACE!
customer_reviews.author: MsAmysGems

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Has more heat coils than other models I've tried. Terrific on a cold day, or if my back gets stiff during a long drive it's very relaxing!
customer_reviews.author: Rick S

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Very thin material - does little to support any portion of a person's back. The High heat setting is no better than the Low setting, only lightly warm to the touch. No medicinal purpose at all. On a cold day might be useful to stay a little warm when traveling otherwise it's rubbish.
customer_reviews.author: Geoworker

customer_reviews.title: This seat is soooooooooo comfortable and it has helped my back tremendously
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this item five stars even though it stopped working approximately 3 months after I bought the first one. Since it is a direct Amazon product they exchanged my old one and sent me a new one. This seat is soooooooooo comfortable and it has helped my back tremendously. I use it on my office chair at work, at home on the couch and even in bed if needed. I love that it isn't a constant heat; the heat regulates itself from high to low all throughout the day. Make sure if you want this seat to use anywhere but the car then you MUST buy the adapter as well. It is all worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Galens

customer_reviews.title: does heat up quickly and definitely helps cut thru chill-also great for back pain on long drives-very plush and padded-have ...
customer_reviews.text: does not get as hot as a standard heated seat that comes with car but...does heat up quickly and definitely helps cut thru chill-also great for back pain on long drives-very plush and padded-have not had any issues with it staying attached to seat or sliding around-just be mindful to unplug after turning car off
customer_reviews.author: wmwphila77

customer_reviews.title: Super product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this car heater seat! I was worried a number of times as I inadvertently left it plugged in. Each time I returned, however, it heated up as soon as I sat in it. It didn't seem to affect my battery in any way. It's almost as though it needs weight on it to even turn on. Glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: acd

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and toasty
customer_reviews.text: I got these because my car seats are old and I need more support, so I was really just looking for cushions. However, this was a better deal and it is seriously one of the best inventions! Great and great price! These heat up rather quickly (take a little longer if it's below 10 degrees Fahrenheit). Very comfortable, too. Because they are cloth, they aren't too hot even if it's hot out. I had a challenging time with the side elastic things to anchor it to my chairs, but the back part works (just put it over the chair), so this isn't a big issue. Overall. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: whitiglil

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, my only complaint is that it slides down a little on the seat even with straps attached.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Dexter

customer_reviews.title: The warmth of the Heated Cushion, helps with circulation & functioning in cold environments.
customer_reviews.text: I have no real pain just some soreness sometimes in my lower back. But, the Heated Cushion really helps to soothe that soreness, especially in the cold winter months. I use this every day in my car & it also helps with the Bersitis in my hips as it keeps my backside, partial hip area, & all down my back thigh area nice & toasty warm. This helps me to function in the cold community as I work a lot outside. This was the best Christmas present I received this year! Thank you son for the thoughtful & much needed gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sabra R. Manriquez

customer_reviews.title: For car use only
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift, my fault for not reading closer, can only be used in the car, other adaptor sold separately . The adaptor is more than what I paid for this. Next time, I will read closer as I could have purchased one for same price with both options
customer_reviews.author: Linz

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my seat and me.
customer_reviews.text: The straps to hold the back in place had to be stretched to their limit to get it on. The front straps go who knows where? If you have a very narrow butt this may suit you, but also if your seat is too large it may not fit. I will return it. Oh, it DOES heat well.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Foollery

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product is of poor quality. The top strap broke sometime when I was at work, the high/low switch was backwards, it was too small so it left a gap on the upper back (making it uncomfortable to sit normally) and it didn't get warm enough. Amazon always makes it easy to return something.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Total crap. Worked twice
customer_reviews.text: Total crap. Worked twice, I ripped the fabric apart to see what had happened, found the low heat element had a burnt out ground, and the high heat element had a burnt out power lead. My guess is that somewhere inside the element it melted apart. Tying the two together got it working again but I don't really feel safe using this in my car with my child and wife with me. Burnt out after the one month period, so I was not able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well but it's soft
customer_reviews.text: First impression is this is so soft and worked good for first 2 minutes but constantly shuts off and doesn't warm the back at all just your bottom... Sad that it doesn't work like I wish it would.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin M Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Toasts them buns
customer_reviews.text: Works great in my beater Hyundai with no heat. The switch is lacking in so far that it is not lit and there is no way to tell if it is on high or low until your buns let you know.
customer_reviews.author: KDude

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for my daughter to use for her car at college. She always complains she is so cold and that my car has heated seats and hers does not. Now she has something to tie her over until she graduates and gets a "real" job and can afford a car with heated seats. She has used it since December and still tells me how much she likes it and how wonderful it is!
customer_reviews.author: genevieve

customer_reviews.title: A Very Affordable, Effective Unit!
customer_reviews.text: I was having hip and lower back pain due to long commutes to work. I took a chance on this, being very affordable and having the car adapter. It has worked out very well. Great lower back support and the 2 heat settings low/high work well. High can get a bit hot if on for too long, but low to me is just right. Too low wouldn't get the job done. This has been one of the key factors in fixing the pain I was experiencing. Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: TO

customer_reviews.title: Heats my seat
customer_reviews.text: but the back slips down into the crevice between the seat bottom and the seat back. Needs to be re-positioned frequently. It does a good job of heating! I took note from other reviews and "turn it off" by unplugging. Am hoping that I won't leave it plugged in by accident. But since I don't have heated seats in my car, this is great to have!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice seat warmer
customer_reviews.text: This cover works well as a seat warmer. It is a bit tight fit for larger size SUV/Truck seats, but we were able to work a way to secure it. It heats up quickly and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Rahalski

customer_reviews.title: Works well in temperatures above 25 degrees F.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the backseat passenger of my crew cab truck. There are no overhead vents in the backseat so it gets really cold. The seat does not heat as warmly as I hoped it would. Works well if it is not below 25 degrees F outside.
customer_reviews.author: suzie

customer_reviews.title: Heats up quickly and actually gets warm!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Arizona-born boyfriend's first winter in Minnesota. He says he can feel it start to heat up after just 10-15 seconds. It works so well he has to turn it off after he's been driving for awhile. I'm thinking I need one too.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Q.

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: The product listing says it provides “lumbar support.” It does not. It’s flimsy and never stays in place. It gets squished beneath me every time I sit down in my car. It does indeed warm up. But that’s about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Adams

customer_reviews.title: Poor cord connection
customer_reviews.text: The seat heated very well, but the cord connection to the cigarette lighter outlet was very touchy--I'd have to jiggle it around for it to turn on even though the connection to the outlet was tight. The fasteners to secure it to the seat were basically useless, but that could very well be me not being able to figure out where to place the little S hangers....that had no where to snag on to.....
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Along

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend approved
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for girlfriend who car has a heater core issue and I wont be able to fix for a little while. She loves it. No longer cold on drive in to work. I tried it out for about 10 minutes and it works good. Might have to get some more for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Warms car seat on cold days!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who is working up north and has no seat warmers in her car. She said it heats up quickly and makes an otherwise cold drive toasty and comfortable! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: stuartgirl

customer_reviews.title: works great and is inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I have a friend who has heated seats in her car. I always thought it was such a luxury that I could never afford. I love this seat and couldn't believe how cheap it was.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay and could be better
customer_reviews.text: I would say the design and quality of this heated seat cushion is pretty good. However, i have concerns about its heating which I feel is not satisfactory. It feels warm but not warm enough to make a significant difference if its really cold (~30-40). Or may be it is my own clothing blocking the heat. But regardless of that, I expected the cushion to have better heating.
customer_reviews.author: Harshul Pandav

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable seat warmer, but it did have a small problem
customer_reviews.text: This item works as stated. It quickly warms up. The seat is thin enough that it does not change the seat position which is a feature I liked. However, I had to return it after 3 days because the fuse burned out and killed my car battery. I received a replacement item and it seems to be working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Heated Seat Cushion
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Heated Seat Cushion for my close friendly elderly neighbor for Christmas present. She loves this seat! It works well. I specifically gave her instructions, turn the heated seat on after starting the car, just in case there is a power surge to damage the mechanism of the seat. Otherwise, this is working great for a month, now.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome heated seat
customer_reviews.text: I mainly bought it for the heated seat & I love it just be careful & never leave it plugged in while out of your car, it killed my battery.
customer_reviews.author: dean

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should but it didn't work for me...
customer_reviews.text: I have leather seats but they aren't heated and I am always cold so I thought this would be great. I was wrong. It works great. It heated up fast and kept me warm but didn't stay in place very well. It also wasn't very comfortable in my car. I think it's the way my seats are shaped and this cover was too bulky to conform to them. Also, the straps to attach it didn't work well. I have a 2007 Toyota Camry Hybrid.
customer_reviews.author: RLMurphy22

customer_reviews.title: Seat heater gave out but . . .
customer_reviews.text: The built in seat heater in my van gave out about 4 years ago. Since then I have had one of these. I'm on my third now so that is why I didn't rate it as a 5 star along with the lasting ability of the elastic for the back. They seem to last at least one to two years - both the heating and the elastic. The heat settings are great.
customer_reviews.author: Agilgolden

customer_reviews.title: Great for cold climates!
customer_reviews.text: This heated seat cushion is awesome for those of us in cold climate areas without a vehicle that has heated seats. It warms up quicker than my friends' built-in heated seats, too. It typically lasts a couple winter seasons in the Midwest. It warms up way before the vehicle can start putting out warm air.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.text: A really nice heated Cushion. It works well, fast and hot. I did not give it 5 stars because the seat area seems a little small, but functionally it works great.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rood

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Her heated seat - of course the drivers - stopped working. Now she is in heaven as she starts work at 5 am. No more shivering on the way to work. Easy installation
customer_reviews.author: NV

customer_reviews.title: Returned.
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable. Doesn't stay in place. Doesn't get warm. Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P

customer_reviews.title: I have back problems and this saves me in the car!
customer_reviews.text: I imagine many people can relate to back issues! Heat is the only thing that keeps me remotely agile, so when I saw this and it was affordable I had some doubt...like too good to be true...but it's awesome. Two levels of heat and the full back heat make it really nice. Super soft material, so even in shorts it's very cozy. I do wish the bottom was a little larger, and I am a small person. But really it isn't meant to heat the back of your knees! Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jazi

customer_reviews.title: These are wonderful! Heat up so quickly
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! Heat up so quickly, very easy to install and stay put. Back also gets warm which is nice. Just wish it was a couple of inches deeper but would buy again. Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Trudie W. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Heated seats cover for my leather seats works well .
customer_reviews.text: ordered because my leather seats are not heated and are very cold in winter. It does not fit the seat too small. Easy to install. The power cord is on the wrong side for a passenger seat. Does work but inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive car seat heater
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for the price! It is well padded making it comfortable to sit on. The elastic bands that go around the back of the seat were very very snug. A bit tough to get it on my car seat, but once in place it isn't going anywhere. I got it yesterday and tried it last night. Not super fast to warm up, but it did the job! Much more affordable option than the factory installed seat warmers!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Chapman

customer_reviews.title: ... Cushion for less than a year and it was great at first
customer_reviews.text: I have had this Seat Cushion for less than a year and it was great at first. Three weeks ago it malfunctioned. Although it was set on "low" within less than five minutes the cushion heated up to the point that I have second degree burns on the back of my legs. Since then I have turned it on a few times to test it and it is overheating within two minutes. BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Knox

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have For Me...will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat warmer. I own a 2015 Mazda CX-5 and it fits my car seat perfectly. I have osteoarthritis and use it every time I get in the car. I just came back from a 3,000-mile road trip and it was a lifesaver for me. I'm not sure the trip would have been as enjoyable without it. I would caution everyone to make sure the light goes out when you car is turned off. It stays lit in my car so I must unplug it when I get out of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Julie R. Riggleman

customer_reviews.title: I honestly think this is the best purchase of my life
customer_reviews.text: I honestly think this is the best purchase of my life. The velour is very soft. I can't speak to the lumbar support- I don't notice it. But that's not why I bought it. This heats up almost immediately. Such a lifesaver in winter!!! It's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like a warm car seat when it’s -15 or lower. The velvety feel is an Extra nice touch. Seems to be be a quality item. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Chymarra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for midwest winters
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to install on seat with elastic straps. It stays put for the most part very minor adjustments to the seat part due to getting in and out. Plugs easily into accessory outlet. I like the fact there are 2 heat settings of high and low. I put it on high for when I first get in to get in nice and warm,and then turn it down to low.
customer_reviews.author: PuddzeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Lovin it!!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and use. Almost instant heat. Perfect for cold New England mornings and days when you don’t have heated seats. I’m in love!! 😊
customer_reviews.author: GS10

customer_reviews.title: Happy Couple
customer_reviews.text: So perfect for warming up fast and keeping warm in car on cold days - my husband gets too hot when we travel (he usually drives) with the car heat on high (which I like) - so I use this to add heat for me on the passenger side, and he keeps the car heater at a lower output - and we are both happy. Four stars because the plug cord needs to be a bit longer so it is easily plugged in from the passenger seat side. It works but is stretched.
customer_reviews.author: msmagnolia88

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for his car that doesn't have a heated seat He loves it, keeps him warm for his early morning drive.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product that does warm your buns
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely loves this thing!!! Winters in Michigan are sometimes cruel and this makes for nice comfy morning commute. Besides that, my wife was very envious of my daughters' new cars that had butt warmers - and I really wanted to do what I could to help keep her bottom side comfy The padding and shape is very comfortable to sit on too.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second seat warmer, the first one I purchased just got way too darn hot for me. While this seat cover is super fuzzy and soft, it doesn't quite fit my seat the best- it squeezes my seats in my CR-V. But it warms up quickly and doesn't get overly warm!! Exactly what I wanted, only took a star off because of super tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: it does exactly as it says it will and it's great in a car that doesn't have seat warmers in ...
customer_reviews.text: Some of the plastic parts on these seat cushions broke right off the bat, which is why I'm not giving it a full 5 stars. Otherwise, it does exactly as it says it will and it's great in a car that doesn't have seat warmers in a climate that gets really cold in the winter. If the plastic clips were designed a bit better, this would be more secure on my car seat, but they snapped the second I tried to clip them on to anything. I ordered two of these, and they broke on both.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: There appear to be two settings: hot and very hot, but that's okay with me (there is also an "off"). The elastic that runs around the back is the seat is snug and I would have preferred an adjustable buckle as it was a little difficult to wrestle it onto the driver's seat of my 2008 Odyssey. I was planning on moving it from the driver's side to the passenger's side during a long drive, but the difficulty in installing it changed my mind.
customer_reviews.author: 1903farmhouse

customer_reviews.title: heats well but is not comfortable to sit on
customer_reviews.text: The unit heats up ok but it does not fit very well, (we have a MB GLC 300 Coupe). It's uncomfortable to sit on but when you need the heat it works. We remove the seat heater when it is not too cold and do not use the straps at all because they do not fit the seat.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: not the best, its small and poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: its small,its not as wide as your basic bucket seat and the top strap broke after 1 day, and i had to sew it back on, it does get warm, but takes a little while. It is better than cold leather seats, but not much. i would look for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: 77vette

customer_reviews.title: Warms my bum in the winter
customer_reviews.text: I’m living in the Stone Age with a stock model car with no modern perks. This was a life saver this winter. It heats up super fast. It obviously plugs into your cars ‘cigarette lighter’, so if you have any other gadgets that plug in there (like a charger), I’d recommend a splitter.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I bought it to use in my winter beater with leather seats that can get pretty cold in the morning
customer_reviews.text: I bought when the price was about $15. I was skeptical that it would work. I bought it to use in my winter beater with leather seats that can get pretty cold in the morning. I was pleasantly surprised that it worked pretty well. Now I wish I had bought 2. I haven't had it for that long so I can't vouch for the durability as some other reviewers have had problems with. However, if it lasts through the winter I'd still consider it money well spent as it has kept me pretty warm through some really cold days up here in the Northeast.
customer_reviews.author: Joatmon

customer_reviews.title: One for my car a Honda-They warm up so fast it is so nice! Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2!! One for my car a Honda-They warm up so fast it is so nice! Works great! Here is the warning part: 1 for my husband's Ford- Now anything plugged into his lighter doesn't shut off when you turn off the car. He left it plugged in and his battery went dead. It's not the product's fault. So, if you have a great memory or a car that does turn off the lighter then I would totally say this is a 5 star product!!! My husband didn't like it cause it drained his battery. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Bates

customer_reviews.title: works great ( update )
customer_reviews.text: Heats up fast before heat from the car . (stopped working now did not last long)
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: Winter warmth for your bum
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my butt warm but moves around on the seat quite a lot. The next car I buy will definitely come with seat warmers!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Howard

product_meta.title: HealthMate IN9438-2 Velour 12V Heated Seat Cushion with Lumbar Support, Heating with Easy Controller, Color Gray, Products by Wagan
feature_bullets: Super soft velour and polyester feels luxurious and comfortable
Maximum heating temperature is 114 degrees Fahrenheit
Has a 0. 5 inch thickness for lumbar support
Simply plug into your vehicle's 12 volt DC outlet
